name: Hivemind (saturnyoshi, MistaJUB, SnakeBlock, orisghost, thxsprites, Oroshibu)
name_original: Hivemind (saturnyoshi, MistaJUB, SnakeBlock, orisghost, thxsprites, Oroshibu)
description:
Hivemind is an action-arcade game with a heavy focus of power in numbers. Under the threat of extermination, the great Hive King takes matters into his own hands to stop those threatening his presence. Recklessly using his loyal bee subjects, he can take back what once belonged to him before the wild life and Hazmats eliminate him once and for all. None shall usurp him of his power!

Features:

  • 80+ room layouts
  • A dozen purchasable upgrades
  • 11 enemies with unique patterns
  • 3 areas to explore
  • An original soundtrack
  • Quality 2D Pixel art graphics

Complete list of contributors:

  • Saturnyoshi - Programming
  • THX  - Art
  • Snakeblock - Art
  • Oroshibu - Art
  • Orisghost - Art
  • attfooy - Art
  • Mista Jub - Sound and music
  • JonTheRealJon - Voice
  • Minichibis - Room layouts
  • bub - Room layouts
  • budj - Room layouts
  • Peas - Moral support

The OST can be found here

NOTE: If fullscreen breaks, press ALT+ENTER to toggle it off and then back on again.
